entry.title: New release for Mantrae: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Changelog

ğŸš€ Features

  • Completely reworked backend, now featuring a proper openapi schema
  • Big UI overhaul and with realtime updates
  • Simplified management tabs, single source of truth for routers, services and middlewares
  • Agents simplified with a better token management

ğŸ› Bug fixes

  • too many :D

Breaking

  • Pretty much everything for now, please reimport your data via a dynamic config yaml backup.
